mapper.select:
select convert(id, char) AS id, p_id AS pId, name, url, sort, menu_code AS menuCode, authority, type from urm_menu where status = '1'
and name like '%#{name}%'
order by sort + 0 asc

select urm_menu.`id`, urm_menu.`p_id` AS pid, urm_menu.`name`, urm_menu.`url`, urm_menu.`type`, urm_menu.`sort`, urm_menu.`menu_code` AS menuCode, urm_menu.`authority`, urm_menu.`authority_info` AS authorityInfo from (select * from urm_role_menu where role_id = #{roleCode}) AS urm_role_menu left join (select * from urm_menu where status = '1') AS urm_menu on urm_role_menu.menu_id = urm_menu.id
